GSD.description:
selinux: fix double free of cond_list on error paths

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit 70caa32e6d81f45f0702070c0e4dfe945e92fbd7. For more details please see the references link.
